title: Stuck at block 17794000 err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version:  `erigon version 2.48.0-stable`

OS & Version: Ubuntu 22.04

Commit hash: 

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

```
ARG=" --chain mainnet --datadir /var/lib/erigon --torrent.download.rate 1024mb --metrics --metrics.addr 0.0.0.0 --ws --http.corsdomain * --http.addr 127.0.0.1 --http.port 8545 --http.api eth,erigon,ots,debug,net,trace --db.pagesize 16kb --batchSize 2048MB --rpc.returndata.limit 1000000 --maxpeers 20 --verbosity debug --log.console.verbosity debug --internalcl --graphql"
```
Concensus Layer: Embedded concensus layer

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): ergion --internalcl

Chain/Network: mainnet

#### Expected behaviour 
Sync to latest block correctly. 

#### Actual behaviour
Stucking at block 17794000

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace
```
Sep 11 20:35:58 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:35:58.723] [txpool.fetch] Handling incoming message msg=NEW_POOLED_TRANSACTION_HASHES_68 err="parsing NewPooledTransactionHashes88: rlp parse: integer encoding for RLP must not have leading zeros: 000000b6"
Sep 11 20:35:58 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:35:58.880] Error while executing stage              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:35:58 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [EROR] [09-11|20:35:58.880] Staged Sync                              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:35:59 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:35:59.381] Error while executing stage              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:35:59 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [EROR] [09-11|20:35:59.381] Staged Sync                              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:35:59 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:35:59.421] [txpool.fetch] Handling incoming message msg=NEW_POOLED_TRANSACTION_HASHES_68 err="parsing NewPooledTransactionHashes88: rlp parse: integer encoding for RLP must not have leading zeros: 000000b8"
Sep 11 20:35:59 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:35:59.882] Error while executing stage              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:35:59 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [EROR] [09-11|20:35:59.882] Staged Sync                              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:36:00.179] Received block via gossip                peers=30 slot=7302778 alloc/sys=6.6GB/10.0GB numGC=74
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:36:00.215] [NewPayload] Downloading some other PoS blocks hash=0x5b0df973a804bd9d8d10a7cecdd825663ddc3826fa11942f36a27fc6e68943c2
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:36:00.249] [ForkChoiceUpdated] Downloading some other PoS stuff hash=0x5b0df973a804bd9d8d10a7cecdd825663ddc3826fa11942f36a27fc6e68943c2
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:36:00.249] New gossip block imported                slot=7302778 head=7302778 headRoot=0xf7a4d34d1e93a21bfd8b4eda31f86f98d21fa9b5df1ca65227098229e3bcb6f1
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [DBUG] [09-11|20:36:00.383] Error while executing stage              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
Sep 11 20:36:00 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[36218]: [EROR] [09-11|20:36:00.383] Staged Sync                              err="[14/15 TxLookup] txnLookupTransform: transform: empty block body 17794000, hash 4317aab509039cadb9acdd5d68e28372a7c2866d50299bc809c69b16d3b36a38"
```


#### print_stages
```
root@Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base ~ # ./erigon-src/build/bin/integration print_stages --chain mainnet --datadir /var/lib/erigon
INFO[09-11|20:37:28.381] logging to file system                   log dir=/var/lib/erigon/logs file prefix=integration log level=info json=false
INFO[09-11|20:37:29.602] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=17794k indices=17794k alloc=2.2GB sys=2.4GB
INFO[09-11|20:37:29.602] [bor snapshots] Blocks Stat              blocks=0k indices=0k alloc=2.2GB sys=2.4GB
Note: prune_at doesn't mean 'all data before were deleted' - it just mean stage.Prune function were run to this block. Because 1 stage may prune multiple data types to different prune distance.

 				 stage_at 	 prune_at
Snapshots 			 17793999 	 0

BorHeimdall 			 0 		 0

Finish 				 18114026 	 0
--

blocks.v2: blocks=17793999, segments=17793999, indices=17793999

history.v3: false,  idx steps: 0.00, lastMaxTxNum=0->0, lastBlockInSnap=0

sequence: EthTx=2080746054, NonCanonicalTx=0

in db: first header 0, last header 0, first body 0, last body 0
--
```

After applying version `v_2.48.0_empty_body`,  the error is gone. 

And the stages info are 
```
root@Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base ~ # ./erigon-src/build/bin/integration print_stages --chain mainnet --datadir /var/lib/erigon
INFO[09-12|15:09:34.522] logging to file system                   log dir=/var/lib/erigon/logs file prefix=integration log level=info json=false
INFO[09-12|15:09:37.234] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=9500k indices=9500k alloc=2.2GB sys=2.4GB
Note: prune_at doesn't mean 'all data before were deleted' - it just mean stage.Prune function were run to this block. Because 1 stage may prune multiple data types to different prune distance.

 				 stage_at 	 prune_at
Snapshots 			 18120431 	 0
Headers 			 18120432 	 0
BlockHashes 			 18120432 	 0
Bodies 				 18120432 	 0
Senders 			 18120432 	 0
Execution 			 18120432 	 18120432
Translation 			 0 		 0

StorageHistoryIndex 		 18120432 	 0

TxLookup 			 18120432 	 17794000
Finish 				 18120432 	 0
--
prune distance:

blocks.v2: blocks=9499999, segments=17793999, indices=9499999

history.v3: false,  idx steps: 0.00, lastMaxTxNum=0->0, lastBlockInSnap=0

sequence: EthTx=2128027564, NonCanonicalTx=0

in db: first header 17795000, last header 18120432, first body 17794000, last body 18120432
--
```

The logs from erigon process is listed as follows

```
Sep 12 15:05:09 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[55691]: [DBUG] [09-12|15:05:09.889] [txpool.fetch] Handling incoming message msg=POOLED_TRANSACTIONS_66 err="rlp parse transaction: unknown transaction type: 23"

^BSep 12 15:05:10 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[55691]: [DBUG] [09-12|15:05:10.793] [txpool.fetch] Handling incoming message msg=POOLED_TRANSACTIONS_66 err="rlp parse transaction: unknown transaction type: 23"

The blocks between 17794000  - 17795000 are missing. Blocks before 17794000 and after 17795000 are existed. 

Please check portal https://otterscan.hetzner.graph.tdf-labs.io/

segments=17793999, indices=9499999
by some reason not all data indexed.
Try run “erigon snapshots index”

> can you try branch `v_2.48.0_empty_body`?

this worked for me. I was facing a different error though (unwinding and 2.48 stable did not help)
`[WARN] [EngineBlockDownloader] Could not insert headers and bodies err="missing body at block=18120345"`

@AskAlexSharov tried both methods (`erigon snapshot index` and `—downloader.verify`), the block body is still missing. 

I also tried to using `v.2.48` to perform indexing, still failed. 

I found that I can retrieve `logs` in missing block `17794000` by using `eth_getLogs`, but cannot retrieve block `17794000` by using `eth_getBlockByNumber`. 

For correct block such as `17793999`, I can read both content successfully. 


Error logs from `erigon version 2.48.0-stable` are listed as follows, 
 
```
